full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 624 Filed 03/02/22 Page 1 of 1 Todd A. Spodek, Esq. Direct Dial: (347) 292-8633 ts@spodeklawgroup.com SPODEK LAW GROUP P.C. Treating you like family since 1976 March 1, 2022 BY EMAIL TO: NathanNYSDChambers@nysd.uscourts.gov Honorable Alison J. Nathan District Judge Thurgood Marshall United States Courthouse 40 Foley Square New York, NY 10007 RE: United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell Case No.: 20-CR-330 (AJN) Southern District of New York Dear Judge Nathan: Please be advised that I represent Juror 50. I am writing in response to Your Honor's February 24, 2022 Order (ECF No.: 610) directing Juror 50 to appear for a hearing on March 8, 2022. I write to inform the Court that Juror 50 will invoke his Fifth Amendment privilege against self-incrimination at the hearing. Thank you for your consideration. Sincerely, Spodek Law Group P.C. /S/ Todd A. Spodek TAS/az cc: All Counsel (By Email). Juror 50 (By Email). 85 Broad Street, 17th Floor NY, NY 10004 | T: (212) 300-5196 | F: (212) 300-6371 | info@spodeklawgroup.com DOJ-OGR-00009614

text_blocks.content: Todd A. Spodek, Esq. Direct Dial: (347) 292-8633 ts@spodeklawgroup.com
SPODEK LAW GROUP P.C. Treating you like family since 1976
Honorable Alison J. Nathan District Judge Thurgood Marshall United States Courthouse 40 Foley Square New York, NY 10007
RE: United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell Case No.: 20-CR-330 (AJN) Southern District of New York

Dear Judge Nathan: Please be advised that I represent Juror 50. I am writing in response to Your Honor's February 24, 2022 Order (ECF No.: 610) directing Juror 50 to appear for a hearing on March 8, 2022. I write to inform the Court that Juror 50 will invoke his Fifth Amendment privilege against self-incrimination at the hearing. Thank you for your consideration.
Sincerely, Spodek Law Group P.C. /S/ Todd A. Spodek
TAS/az cc: All Counsel (By Email). Juror 50 (By Email).
85 Broad Street, 17th Floor NY, NY 10004 | T: (212) 300-5196 | F: (212) 300-6371 | info@spodeklawgroup.com

additional_notes: The document is a letter from Todd A. Spodek, Esq. of Spodek Law Group P.C. to Honorable Alison J. Nathan, District Judge. The letter is dated March 1, 2022, and is in response to a court order regarding Juror 50 in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.
